واحد های صنعتی ، شهرک های صنعتی و شرکت ه: Industrial units ,  industrial towns ,  and companies located in industrial towns are all part of the industry that has a significant portion of the country's economy in their hands.
شهرک\u200Cهای صنعتی مناطقی هستند که علاو: Industrial settlements are areas that ,  in addition to providing adequate ,  complete ,  justifiable and economically viable infrastructure ,  provide this environment while preserving environmental issues by integrating industrial units together ,  enabling new partnerships and synergies of industrial units. Made more. In recent years ,  providing new technical and commercial services such as creating industrial clusters ,  training industrial units ,  industrial and exhibition tours ,  supporting export markets ,  etc. has also been on the agenda of the organization's tasks at the level of industrial settlements .
کارگاه ها بخش اعظمی از صنایع کوچک کشور م: Workshops are a large part of our country's small industries that produce many of the products used by the public
کارگاه بخشی فنی از امور تولیدی یک کارخان: A workshop is a technical part of a factory's production affairs in which the production of a product ,  or a particular process of production ,  takes place. Like a molding workshop or a dyeing workshop. Workshop literally means the place of work of a room or building that provides both the space and the tools (or machines) needed to manufacture or repair manufactured goods. Examples include industrial ,  agricultural ,  mining ,  construction ,  transportation ,  passenger ,  service ,  commercial ,  manufacturing ,  public places ,  and the like.
نمایشگاه ها نقش بسیار مهمی در معرفی محصو: Exhibitions play a very important role in introducing factory manufactured products and workshops to both distributors and consumers who are the same people.
نمایشگاه مجازی یک نمایشگاه دائمی است که: A virtual exhibition is a permanent exhibition that operates online. In fact ,  it is an exhibition app that enables companies to showcase products ,  services ,  exports and sales. How to use the Virtual Exhibition: Companies with membership and ordering booths can provide all the necessary information about their company such as contact information ,  company biography ,  products ,  certificates ,  news with the username and password provided to them.  ,  Pictures and ... insert in their own booth.
